title: unai nambi
sahitya:
unai nambi EmAndEn aiyA uLLE viSattai vaittu shirippilE neruppaik-kakkum


anupallavi

  vinai vashamE deivamenrunnai ellOrum vEdamum pugazhavE pEdai madiyAl nAnum


caraNam 1    pittam piDittavan pAdi uDalil oru peNNai shumandavan talai mElum
 maraittoru peN vaitta kuraimati koNDavan pittalATTam onrum ariyAmal shivanE
  caraNam 2   tegiDu dattam sheidanru kallAlum villAlum sheruppAlum
 udai paTTa kaDai ariyAmal tegiDu tattOm dhIm enru tillai
 shuDu kATTil Adum anAdi OrANDi enrariyAmal
